Name:
HMCS Lachute
Cristobal Colon
Builder: Morton Engineering & Dry Dock Co., Quebec City
Fate:
Sold to Dominican Republic in 1947
Removed from active list 1978; wrecked 1979
Propulsion:
single shaft
2 × water tube boilers
1 × 4-cylinder triple-expansion reciprocating steam engine
2,750 ihp (2,050 kW)
Range: 3,500 nautical miles (6,482 km) at 12 knots (22.2 km/h)
Armament:
1 × 4 in (102 mm) BL Mk.IX single gun
1 × 2-pdr. Mk.VIII single "pom-pom" AA gun
2 × 20 mm Oerlikon single
1 × Hedgehog A/S mortar
4 × Mk.II depth charge throwers
2 depth charge rails with 70 depth charges
